scenarios.name: Page loads successfully
scenarios.details: Page loaded and redirected to draft quote Q-202601-0031 (expected behavior - auto-creates draft)

scenarios.name: No console errors
scenarios.details: No JavaScript errors, exceptions, or failed requests detected in console

scenarios.name: Customer dropdown exists
scenarios.details: Customer combobox (ref_27) present with 5 customer options available

scenarios.name: Seller company dropdown exists
scenarios.details: Seller company combobox (ref_28) present with 1 seller company option (MBR)

scenarios.name: Form action buttons exist
scenarios.details: All key buttons present: Add row (ref_33), Upload from file (ref_34), Save (ref_35), Submit to procurement (ref_36)

notes: The /quotes/new URL automatically creates a draft quote and redirects to the quote detail page with the Overview tab active. This is expected behavior based on the hub-and-spoke navigation model.
